synthesis_conditions.procedure: anhydrous Zn(O2CCH3)2 was suspended in THF and 1,3-bis(dimethylamino)-2-propanol was added while the mixture was stirred. A clear solution resulted in 1 h. Colorless crystals grew from the solution during the slow evaporation of 30 mL of solvent at reduced pressure.

characterization.1H_NMR_CDCl3: δ 1.98 (s, 18H, 6CH3CO2-), 2.14 (dd, J = 11 and 3 Hz, 4H, 2CH2equatorial), 2.43 (s, 24H, 4(CH3)2N), 2.55 (t, J = 11 Hz, 4H, 2CH2apical), 3.94 (tt, J = 11 and 3 Hz, 2H, 2CHO)

synthesis_conditions.procedure: Pentane (5.7 mL) was added to the solution of 1 (180 mg) in CH2Cl2 (2 mL). The first tiny, regular-shaped crystals were observed to form after 5 h. After 2 days the solution was decanted and the crystals of 1-catena (155 mg, 86%) were collected and dried in vacuo for 15 min. The crystals of 1-catena·2CD2Cl2 used for X-ray crystallography were grown from 0.08 M CD2Cl2 solution of 1.

characterization.1H_NMR_CDCl3: spectrum is identical to the spectrum of 1

synthesis_conditions.procedure: Compound 2 was prepared analogously as described above for 1, in 57% yield.

characterization.1H_NMR_CDCl3: δ 1.01 (t, J = 7.5 Hz, 18H, 6CH3CH2), 2.14 (dd, J = 11 and 3 Hz, 4H, 2NCH2equatorial), 2.23 (q, J = 7.5 Hz, 12H, 6CH3CH2), 2.44 (s, 24H, 4(CH3)2N), 2.54 (t, J = 11 Hz, 4H, 2NCH2apical), 3.94 (tt, J = 11 and 3 Hz, 2H, 2CHO)
